main event: A round red object, described as the size of a grapefruit, caused a power outage during a sighting in Manchester, New Hampshire on 7 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was reported to have an irregular flight path., The sighting lasted for about one minute., There was no sound associated with the object., The sighting was made using 25 power binoculars., There were four other reports of the same UFO in the area.
sighted object: a round red object, the size of a grapefruit
witness description: 17-year-old observer looking out the window of his home
